title: A Woman of the Sword
description: A Woman of the Sword is an epic fantasy seen through the eyes of an ordinary woman. Lidae is a daughter, a wife, a mother - and a great warrior born to fight. Her sword is hungry for killing, her right hand is red with blood.War is very much a woman's business. But war is not kind to women. And war is not kind to mothers and their sons.
author: Anna Smith Spark
